subject: College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Rutgers Coach Greg Schiano has rejected overtures to become the next coach at Michigan, providing another public blow to that university’s search for a successor to Lloyd Carr.
snippet: Rutgers Coach Greg Schiano has rejected overtures to become the next coach at Michigan, providing another public blow to that university’s search for a successor to Lloyd Carr.
